overview: An innocent woman (Jewel Denyle) is thrust into the world of the undead when she becomes a brutal murder and inadvertently becomes the next target. Fearing for life, she seeks the aid of a young detective (dillion day) only to find that there is no protection from those who stalk her. No refuge from the wrath of the undead nor their queen (sydnee steele). Her tow becomes riddled with a nightmare only to wake to find that she has become one of them.
title: Dark Angels
